title: Add Viper Elite gaming mouse to mice product category

requirements.summary: Add Viper Elite gaming mouse to the mice product array with complete gaming specifications
acceptanceCriteria: A new product object for Viper Elite mouse is added to the mice array
Product includes all standard fields: name, price, description, image, specs
Specifications include gaming-relevant details like DPI, polling rate, sensor, weight
Product data follows the same structure and format as existing mice products
The new mouse appears in the Mice section on the homepage

file_operations.description: Add a new Viper Elite gaming mouse product object to the mice array. Include all required fields: name set to 'Viper Elite', competitive price point consistent with existing high-end mice, compelling description highlighting gaming performance, image path (can use placeholder or existing mouse image), and comprehensive specs object containing DPI range (e.g., 100-30000), polling rate (e.g., 1000Hz), sensor type (e.g., optical), weight in grams, connectivity options (wired/wireless), and any additional gaming-relevant specifications. Follow the exact Product interface structure and formatting conventions used by the existing six mouse products in the array.
